channel.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
channel.description:
Ask here for tips and tricks about this chapter. Tell where you're stuck and others will give the solutions.
[i](Please keep always on topic. Don't post about other chapters or create random chit-chat here)[/i]
More tips about this chapter also can be found in [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12645']this thread[/url].

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: andrewxc
item.description:
Probably it fell between some objects.
That happened all the time when Source first came out.
I am slightly disappointed that throwing things doesn’t seem to do any real damage, but I’ll get over it.

Read full topic

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: KaptainIgloo
item.description:
Thank you for your reply! I had seen the vavle… but I had thrown it at a zombie (kinda hoping that it would kill it:D)

Impossible to find it afterward, I really looked everywhere… it seems that it just disappeared.

Anyway, I used the cheat and moved forward.
Thanks again for your time

Read full topic

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: andrewxc
item.description:
Hi!
I’m stuck… I am supposed to turn 2 valves to open a door (feeder 1 and 2). Feeder 1 was easy, but for feader 2, I can’t turn it on!! I found the place, but the valve is missing! I run anyway but did not find it… help please!!

Okay, so the valve is on the ground, next to the feeder pipe. You have to pick it up, and it will automatically connect, when you bring it near the steaming Feeder 2 pipe.
If yours is actually missing, you may have to turn on cheats (temporarily) in the Dev Console with “sv_cheats 1”.
Then type the following: “ent_teleport coolant_pipe_1_wheel_physmdl”
This should cause the valve wheel to teleport to wherever your cursor is pointing. Then turn off cheats with “sv_cheats 0”.

Read full topic

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: soupdragon
item.description:
Can someone help me out here? I’ve got back to the main entry area - big Black Mesa Research Facility map on the wall - the the guard guy keeps calling for help over the comms, there is a long drop nearby where a guard falls to his death - as do I. I must have died dozens of times trying to escape this area.

How do I get out out of here? There doesn’t seem to be any escape from this area. The fact its so dark doesn’t help. Still not found any crowbar or weapons yet!

Read full topic

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?

item.description:
Yes, there’s only one houndeye, which can be defeated pretty easily with the crowbar, before you get a gun.

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Seinfeld_for_life
item.description:
KiLlEr:

where do I find the glock now? The guard who drags himself along the floor does not have it anymore and now I am already facing Houndeyes, just armed with a crowbar. How am I supposed to survive this?
Or did I miss something?
When I picked up the crowbar I jumped back into the vent to grab the pistol from the guard who is calling for help, but when I got there he was gone.
So am I supposed to face Houndeyes with just the crowbar or did I miss anything?

You have to use the crowbar to kill the houndeye first, then you get the glock a bit after. :lambda:

Read full topic

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: KiLlEr
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

You face a single Houndeye before you get the Glock. Glocks are all over the chapter, after that point.

thanks for the reply! I thought I missed something

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Stick to the left-hand side, hugging the wall, and hold backwards as you go down. Alternatively you put in the map command. I think it’s “map bm_c1a1d”

item.title: UNFORESEEN CONSEQUENCES - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: hfrog713
item.description:
Yes that is the elevator i was referring to. I guess it must be a bug. My friend was just telling me about noclip. Thank you for your help. I will let you know how it goes.

danielsangeo:

The attachment is not showing. I think it’s a faulty upload. If you’re referring to this elevator:
Image 1 | Image 2

… and that elevator is closed, you probably have found a bug because the doors are supposed to be open. Your options, if this elevator isn’t open to you, is either start a new game at the UC chapter or “noclip” into the elevator to continue.

To noclip (if you don’t know how that works), type sv_cheats 1 into the console, then type noclip. You will be able to pass through the doors. Type noclip again to turn it off and you should be able to press the button to move the elevator to the next chapter. Oh, and type sv_cheats 0 to turn off cheats.

Read full topic
